mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(username, login_id, password, phone_number, email, birth_date, provider, provider_id) VALUES (#{username}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{birthDate}, #{provider}, #{providerId})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.login_id, u.password, u.phone_number, u.email, u.created_at, u.updated_at, u.birth_date, u.provider, u.provider_id, u.is_deleted, u.deleted_at, a.auth FROM User u LEFT OUTER JOIN Auth a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND (u.is_deleted = FALSE OR u.is_deleted IS NULL)
